metadata.notes: Complete Plant Food Company product catalog for Golf & Professional Turf. NPK values confirmed from product names/pages. Density values not published on website for most products - set to 0 where unknown. Secondary nutrient percentages included where listed on product pages. Application rates are typical greens/fine turf rates.

pfc_0_0_25_potassium.application_notes: Chloride-free potassium + sulfur solution. Addresses potassium shortages, sulfur aids nitrogen utilization. Apply 4-8 oz/1000 sq ft every 14 days on greens.

pfc_polyphosphite_30.application_notes: Pure potassium polyphosphite fertilizer solution. Delivers potassium nutrition while promoting disease resistance through phosphite uptake. Apply 2-6 oz/1000 sq ft every 10-21 days.

pfc_infiltrate_k.application_notes: Organic-based potassium acetate with rapid foliar uptake. Low burn potential, high K absorption. Reduces freezing temperature of water, may reduce frost incidence. Apply 2-8 oz/1000 sq ft every 14 days.

pfc_dkp_xtra.application_notes: Systemic liquid combining potassium polyphosphate and polyphosphite. Enhances root development, activates plant defense mechanisms. Can be used as starter fertilizer.

pfc_7_0_0_sulfur.application_notes: 100% ammonium nitrogen with sulfur. Lowers soil pH, enhances micronutrient availability. Helps reduce summer patch, take-all patch, and spring dead spot.

pfc_7_0_7_sulfur.application_notes: Balanced N:K ratio with 20% thiosulfate sulfur releasing over 1-3 weeks. Ammoniacal nitrogen works in cool temperatures, reduces volatilization. Apply 5-17 oz/1000 sq ft every 10-14 days.

pfc_8_16_8.application_notes: High phosphate starter/transplant solution. Contains ortho and polyphosphates for plant establishment. Reduces transplant shock and wilting losses. Apply 8-16 oz/1000 sq ft every 7-14 days.

pfc_8_27_5_healthy_start.application_notes: Ammonium polyphosphate and phosphite solution. Each gallon contains 24 oz of PolyPhosphite 30. Stimulates rooting, enhances cell wall structure. Apply 4-8 oz/1000 sq ft every 10-14 days. Poa stress recovery: 15 oz/1000 sq ft.

pfc_10_2_4_blu_gro.application_notes: 5:1:2 ratio liquid with quick-release ammonium and nitrate nitrogen, EDTA chelated micronutrients. Chloride-free. Excellent for cool-season applications. Apply 5-12.8 oz/1000 sq ft every 7 days.

pfc_10_2_10_srn.application_notes: 1:1 N:K ratio fertilizer with 50% slow-release Triazone nitrogen. Suitable for foliar and root fertilization. Apply 10-15 oz/1000 sq ft every 10-28 days.

pfc_10_4_6_blu_gro.application_notes: 5:2:3 ratio with quick-release ammonium/nitrate nitrogen. EDTA chelated micronutrients. Ideal for early spring, fall, and cool-temperature applications. Apply 5-12.8 oz/1000 sq ft every 7 days.

pfc_10_10_10_blu_gro.application_notes: Balanced 1:1:1 liquid fertilizer with urea nitrogen and EDTA chelated micronutrients. Complete plant nutrition for turf, trees, shrubs, and ornamentals. Apply 5-16 oz/1000 sq ft every 7 days.

pfc_10_34_0.application_notes: High phosphate liquid for Poa annua stress relief and root development. Apply 8-12 oz/1000 sq ft every 7-14 days. Excellent pre/post-aerification product.

pfc_12_0_12_srn.application_notes: Balanced N:K ratio with 50% Triazone slow-release nitrogen. EDTA chelated micronutrients. Phosphate-free. Apply 10-20 oz/1000 sq ft every 14 days.

pfc_12_3_12_srn.application_notes: Balanced N:K with 50% Triazone SRN + quick-release nitrogen. Full EDTA chelated micronutrient package with sulfur. Apply 10-20 oz/1000 sq ft every 14 days.

pfc_12_3_12_synergy.application_notes: 12-3-12 with Vitamin and Amino Acid Matrix (VAM), carbohydrates, sulfur, and EDTA micronutrients. 50% Triazone SRN. Enhanced biostimulant properties. Apply 10-20 oz/1000 sq ft every 14 days.

pfc_16_0_8_srn.application_notes: 2:1 N:K ratio with 50% Triazone SRN. No phosphate. Full EDTA chelated micronutrient package. Apply 6-16 oz/1000 sq ft every 7-14 days. Avoid extremely hot/dry conditions.

pfc_16_2_5_srn.application_notes: Multi-ingredient liquid with 4 nitrogen sources, 2 potassium sources, chelated micronutrients. 25% Triazone SRN. Includes amino acid matrix with carbohydrates (AAMC). Apply 3-16 oz/1000 sq ft every 7-14 days.

pfc_16_2_7_srn.application_notes: Multi-ingredient liquid with 4 nitrogen sources, 2 potassium sources, chelated micronutrients. 25% Triazone SRN. Amino acid matrix, carbohydrates, magnesium/sulfur blend. Apply 6-16 oz/1000 sq ft every 7-14 days.

pfc_16_2_8_srn.application_notes: 50% Triazone SRN with full EDTA chelated micronutrient package and sulfur. Immediate response plus extended nitrogen release. Apply 6-16 oz/1000 sq ft every 7-14 days.

pfc_18_3_3_green_t.application_notes: Cost-effective high nitrogen foliar fertilizer. Quick-release nitrogen for immediate plant response. Apply 3.5-7 oz/1000 sq ft every 7-14 days on greens. Tank mixes well with PolyPhosphite 30 and 12 Iron.

pfc_18_3_4_super_mk.application_notes: High nitrogen with Vitamin Amino Acid Matrix (VAM), carbohydrates, and EDTA chelated micronutrients. All quick-release nitrogen. Apply 4-12 oz/1000 sq ft every 7-14 days.

pfc_18_3_6_srn.application_notes: High N:K ratio with full EDTA chelated micronutrient package. 50% Triazone SRN. Suitable for foliar and root fertilization. Apply 7-15 oz/1000 sq ft every 7-14 days.

pfc_20_0_0_srn.application_notes: Pure nitrogen with 50% Triazone slow-release. Immediate plant response plus extended release. Apply 4-14 oz/1000 sq ft every 7-14 days. Special order minimum 500 gallons.

pfc_20_3_3_srn.application_notes: General purpose turf solution with 20% SRN and iron. Non-chloride potassium. Controlled fairway feed for year-round application. Apply 4-14 oz/1000 sq ft every 7-14 days on greens; 10-16 oz/1000 sq ft 3-5 times yearly on fairways.

pfc_26_1_4_msn.application_notes: 75% Methylene Stabilized Nitrogen (MSN). Extended nitrogen release, minimizes volatilization and nitrate leaching. Best for fairways/roughs. Apply 4-12 oz/1000 sq ft every 14-28 days. Tank mix with 12 Iron for enhanced color.

pfc_28_0_0_srn.application_notes: Clear liquid urea Triazone solution with 72% slow-release nitrogen. Highest SRN percentage. Safe for turf with enhanced nitrogen absorption. Apply 5-11 oz/1000 sq ft every 7-14 days on greens.

pfc_29_0_0_srn.application_notes: Cost-effective high nitrogen with 4 different nitrogen sources including ammonium nitrate, urea, ammonium thiosulfate, and Triazone SRN. Contains calcium, sulfur, and chelated micronutrients.

pfc_30_0_0_uan.application_notes: Urea ammonium nitrate quick-release nitrogen. Combination of nitrate, ammoniacal, and urea nitrogen for rapid response in cool conditions. Apply 2-3 oz/1000 sq ft every 7-14 days. Dilute with plenty of water to avoid burn.

pfc_30_0_0_60_srn.application_notes: Clear liquid with 60% SRN from methylene urea and Triazone polymers. Nitrogen releases over 60-90 days depending on soil conditions. High stability when blended. Apply 4-8 oz/1000 sq ft every 7-14 days on greens.

pfc_30_0_0_90_msn.application_notes: 90% Methylene Stabilized Nitrogen. Triazone-methylene urea complex minimizes volatilization and prevents nitrate movement. Extended release throughout growing season. Apply 4-8 oz/1000 sq ft every 7-14 days.

pfc_adams_earth.application_notes: Organic blend of humic/fulvic acids, amino acids, North Atlantic seaweed extract, natural sugars, vitamins. Improves soil structure, rooting, nutrient uptake, and microbial activity. Apply 2-6 oz/1000 sq ft.

pfc_blackstrap_molasses.application_notes: Sugar refining byproduct containing sugars, carbon, enzymes, B-vitamins, and trace elements. Promotes soil microorganism activity, reduces thatch accumulation. Apply 3-6 oz/1000 sq ft every 10-14 days.

pfc_impulse_green_t.application_notes: Amino acid + sucrose + salicylic acid biostimulant. Increases potassium and calcium within cell walls, improves stress tolerance, triggers Systemic Acquired Resistance. Apply 3-9 oz/1000 sq ft every 7-14 days.

pfc_kelplant.application_notes: North Atlantic Ascophyllum Nodosum seaweed extract with humic and fulvic acids. Improves root mass, stress tolerance, chlorophyll content, and antioxidant levels. Contains natural plant hormones. Apply 2-6 oz/1000 sq ft every 14 days.

pfc_omega_x34.application_notes: Yucca plant extracts and chitosan biopolymer. Triggers plant defense responses, chelates nutrients, natural wetting agent. Enhances uptake of fungicides, insecticides, and fertilizers. MUST adjust spray pH to 3.5-5.5 before adding. Apply 0.37-1.46 oz/1000 sq ft foliar.

pfc_humic_acid_19.application_notes: Concentrated liquid humic acid with micronutrients. Enhances nutrient uptake, improves water retention and infiltration. Soil conditioner. Apply 3-6 oz/1000 sq ft every 7 days on fine turf.

pfc_sugar_cal.application_notes: Sorbitol/mannitol chelated calcium acetate. Prevents and corrects calcium deficiencies. Supports cell wall formation, regulates nutrient uptake. Apply 3-6 oz/1000 sq ft every 10-14 days.

pfc_cal_nitrate.application_notes: Calcium essential for cell structure with nitrate nitrogen for turf color. Stimulates roots and leaf formation, neutralizes organic acids. Apply 5-24 oz/1000 sq ft.

pfc_calcium_thiosulfate.application_notes: Neutral to basic chlorine-free calcium and sulfur solution. Thiosulfate sulfur available over several weeks. Apply 6-12 oz/1000 sq ft soil spray every 14 days; 30-40 oz/1000 sq ft via fertigation.

pfc_magnesium_4.application_notes: Glucoheptonate chelated magnesium. Prevents and corrects magnesium deficiencies. Promotes deeper green coloration. Apply 1.5-4 oz/1000 sq ft.

pfc_magnesium_nitrate.application_notes: Nitrate nitrogen with 6% magnesium from magnesium oxide and nitric acid. Supports chlorophyll, protein synthesis, and carbohydrate transport. Apply 4-16 oz/1000 sq ft every 14 days.

pfc_amm_thiosulfate.application_notes: Ammoniacal nitrogen rapidly absorbed by plants plus 26% sulfur. Clear liquid, pH 7-8. Do not apply on germinating seeds. Apply 3-12 oz/1000 sq ft every 14 days.

pfc_30_cal.application_notes: 12% calcium from calcium carbonate and calcium acetate. Immediate + gradual calcium release. Supports cell wall development, displaces soil sodium. Apply 3-12 oz/1000 sq ft soil; 0.75-6 oz/1000 sq ft foliar.

pfc_foremula_liquagyp.application_notes: Liquid gypsum alternative. Supplies highly soluble calcium to displace soil sodium. Eliminates black layer, reduces SAR, increases infiltration. 6 oz provides similar calcium as 5-10 lbs granular gypsum. Apply 3-6 oz/1000 sq ft.

pfc_foremula_liqualime.application_notes: Liquid calcium carbonate alternative to granular limestone. Three calcium sources with thiosulfate sulfur. Displaces sodium/chloride, increases pH, generates CO2 for photosynthesis. Do not tank mix with phosphate products. Apply 3-6 oz/1000 sq ft.

pfc_6_iron.application_notes: 6% iron + 12% nitrogen with ALPHA MAT Solutions mineral acid technology. Deepens green color, releases bound nutrients over 21-28 days. Corrosive - use stainless steel or PVC fittings only.

pfc_12_iron.application_notes: Glucoheptonate chelated iron, manganese, and magnesium. 3:1 Fe:Mn ratio. Visible turf response within 12 hours. Promotes deep green color without excessive growth. Compatible with fungicides and growth regulators.

pfc_boron_10.application_notes: Readily available boron source for foliar and fertigation. Essential for new tissue development and growth. Apply 0.5-1.0 oz/1000 sq ft. Max 1 gallon per acre per application.

pfc_copper_5.application_notes: Glucoheptonate chelated copper. Prevents binding with phosphate. Supports photosynthesis, chlorophyll synthesis, and vitamin A production. May help suppress certain diseases. Apply 1-2 oz/1000 sq ft.

pfc_iron_5.application_notes: Glucoheptonate chelated iron. Enters plant tissue within 12-48 hours. Essential for chlorophyll production and oxygen transport. Apply 1-3 oz/1000 sq ft.

pfc_kelp_iron.application_notes: Iron with manganese and fulvic acid. 3:1 Fe:Mn ratio. Acid-based formulation dissolves bicarbonates. Promotes deep green turf. Corrosive - use stainless steel or PVC fittings only.

pfc_manganese_5.application_notes: Glucoheptonate chelated manganese. Enters plant tissue within 12-48 hours. Supports chlorophyll development, reduces plant stress and disease susceptibility. Apply 0.75-3 oz/1000 sq ft.

pfc_micro_mix.application_notes: Glucoheptonate chelated micronutrient blend with magnesium and sulfur. Prevents soil binding, maintains plant availability. Apply 2-4 oz/1000 sq ft every 10-14 days.

pfc_sili_k.application_notes: Silica and potassium complex. Stiffens leaf blades, improves mowing cut and ball roll. Enhances photosynthesis, wear tolerance, and drought resistance. Apply 1-2 oz/1000 sq ft every 10-14 days.

pfc_zinc_7.application_notes: Glucoheptonate chelated zinc. Prevents and corrects zinc deficiencies. Apply 1-3 oz/1000 sq ft during active growth. Exceeding 3 oz/1000 sq ft only if soil/tissue tests warrant.

pfc_phusion_manganese_7.application_notes: Acid-based manganese with Urea-Sulfuric Acid for high-pH soils. Increases manganese availability when soil pH exceeds 7.0. Promotes chlorophyll production, darker green tissue. Reduces disease susceptibility in Mn-deficient soils.

pfc_micro_pack_edta.product_name: Green-T Micro Pack EDTA Chelate Solution
pfc_micro_pack_edta.application_notes: EDTA chelated micronutrient package. Longest-lasting chelation protection. Micronutrients available in ~3 days, lasts ~4 weeks. Apply 0.75 oz/1000 sq ft every 7 days on greens; 1.47 oz/1000 sq ft every 14 days on fairways.

pfc_hydration_a_plus.application_notes: ALPHA MAT solubilizing surfactant. Provides uniform water movement and consistent moisture. Dissolves bicarbonates, frees calcium to displace sodium. Prevents localized dry spots. Zero burn potential. Lasts 21-28 days.

pfc_flo_thru_a_plus.application_notes: Acid-based penetrant and bicarbonate reducer. Dissolves bicarbonates, frees calcium. Reduces water tension for even spray coverage. ALPHA MAT technology lasts 21-28 days.

pfc_regulate_plus.application_notes: Penetrant and super water holding agent. Prevents and cures localized dry spots (LDS). Eliminates water channeling in soil profile. Push-up greens: 2-3 oz/1000 sq ft every 2 weeks. Sand-based greens: 4 oz/1000 sq ft every 2 weeks.

pfc_flo_thru_plus.application_notes: Concentrated soil penetrant with salicylic acid. Breaks water tension for uniform penetration. Reduces dew, improves drainage, increases green speed. Apply 1-2 oz/1000 sq ft every 4 weeks; difficult areas 3-4 oz/1000 sq ft.

pfc_hydration.application_notes: 100% nonionic surfactant blend super water holding agent. Prevents and cures localized dry spots. Improves seed germination. Push-up greens: 1-2 oz/1000 sq ft every 2 weeks. Sand-based greens: 2 oz/1000 sq ft every 2 weeks.

pfc_a_plus_pellet.application_notes: Solid wetting agent pellet with surfactants, mineral acid, and salicylic acid. For spot treatment of dry patches on greens, tees, bunker banks. Each 8 oz pellet treats 8,000-10,000 sq ft. Dissolve in hose-end applicator.

pfc_hydration_ac.application_notes: Tech-grade concentrated injection solution for fertigation systems. Wall-to-wall moisture control. Pure virgin ingredients, no corrosive additives. Prevents localized dry spots, improves nutrient uptake, reduces dew and frost.

pfc_greenblade.application_notes: Turf colorant and spray pattern indicator. High-quality pigments with UV resistance. Add to spray tank first after water. Maintain pH above 3.5. Greens: 0.18-0.28 oz/1000 sq ft. Fairways: 0.23-0.46 oz/1000 sq ft.

pfc_phirst.application_notes: 15% urea + 49% sulfuric acid water treatment. Acidifies water, destroys bicarbonates, frees soil-bound calcium and magnesium. Specific gravity 1.52. Use when bicarbonates exceed 120 ppm or SAR exceeds 6.0. Contains corrosion inhibitor.

pfc_phusion_organic_acid.application_notes: Modified organic acid from lignin with 30% carbon. Acidifies water, destroys bicarbonates, frees calcium and magnesium. Supplies carbon to soil microorganisms. Buffers against metal corrosion. Apply 2-3 oz/1000 sq ft monthly.

pfc_alpha_mat.application_notes: Long-lasting mineral acid technology with penetrating surfactant and salicylic acid. Dissolves bicarbonates, frees calcium. Spray tank pH buffer (3-5 oz/100 gal when pH exceeds 5.9). Apply 0.375-0.745 oz/1000 sq ft.

pfc_kphite_7lp.application_notes: Systemic fungicide/bactericide for Pythium, Phytophthora, Downy Mildew, and other diseases. For greenhouse, ornamental, forestry, and turf use. See product label for specific rates.

pfc_humic_acid_70.application_notes: Granulated humate soil conditioner (125 SGN). Increases root growth, improves nutrient uptake, buffers soil pH. Apply 5 lbs/1000 sq ft monthly on fine turf.

pfc_gypsum_phusion.application_notes: Pelletized calcium sulfate reacted with organic acid for faster calcium/sulfur release. Addresses deficiencies without raising pH. Reduces elevated sodium. Apply 5 lbs/1000 sq ft minimum twice per season. Max 15 lbs/1000 sq ft.

pfc_lime_phusion.application_notes: Pelletized calcitic limestone reacted with organic acid. Works 4x faster than conventional limestone at similar rates. Half the application rate of traditional lime. Apply 5 lbs/1000 sq ft twice per season. pH adjustment: 12 lbs/1000 sq ft.

pfc_kcs_plus.application_notes: Five-nutrient granular: potassium, calcium, magnesium, sulfur, and manganese. pHusion Organic Acid technology releases tied-up nutrients. Optimizes soil chemistry. Manganese supports chlorophyll and patch disease reduction.

pfc_kms_plus.application_notes: Four vital nutrients: potassium, calcium, magnesium, and sulfur. pHusion Organic Acid releases nutrient complexes. Apply 4-8 lbs/1000 sq ft, max 5 lbs/application on established turf. Repeat every 3-4 weeks.

pfc_kms_0_0_28.application_notes: Three vital nutrients: potassium, magnesium, and sulfur. pHusion Organic Acid technology. Apply 2-4 lbs/1000 sq ft every 3-4 weeks. Best applied after aeration for soil incorporation.

pfc_kcs_0_0_25.application_notes: Three vital nutrients: potassium, calcium, and sulfur. pHusion Organic Acid technology releases bound nutrients. Apply 2-4 lbs/1000 sq ft every 3-4 weeks. Max 4 lbs/1000 sq ft per application. Useful for reducing elevated sodium.

pfc_sea_e_c.application_notes: Zeolite and leonardite blend. Increases cation exchange capacity (CEC). Attracts and holds potassium, calcium, and magnesium. Prevents nutrient leaching. Mix with topdressing sand and divot mix.

pfc_gypsum_connection.application_notes: Gypsum with zeolite, humic acid, manganese, and potassium. Improves soil chemistry, turf strength, stress tolerance. Creates firmer playing surfaces. Potassium activates enzymes for photosynthesis and water regulation.

pfc_10_10_10_connection.application_notes: Balanced granular fertilizer with zeolite and humic acid. Stabilizes ammoniacal nitrogen in soil. Improves CEC and nutrient retention. For fairways, tees, sandy soils, and high-pH conditions.
